popup.title: Arti AI Detector
popup.reportPageDescription: Help the community by reporting AI-generated content on this page.
popup.noActionsAvailable: No actions available for this page
popup.popup_noActionsAvailable: No actions available for this page

status.aiDescription: Community confirmed this page contains AI-generated content
status.not_aiDescription: Community confirmed this page contains human-created content
status.unknownDescription: This page hasn't been reported yet
status.unknownWithReports: Not reported but domain has reports
status.whitelistedDescription: This domain is on the trusted list
status.status_not_iaDescription: This content was not detected as AI-generated.

report.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe why you think this is AI content...
report.infoText: Your report will be reviewed by the community. Other users can vote to approve or refute your findings.

vote.description: Do you agree with this report? Cast your vote to help the community.
vote.notAiHelp: This content appears to be human-created

stats.title: My Statistics
stats.badgeDescReports: Submit reports to unlock this badge. Next tier: {n} reports.
stats.badgeDescVotes: Vote on reports to unlock this badge. Next tier: {n} votes.
stats.badgeDescVotesReceived: Receive votes on your reports to unlock this badge. Next tier: {n} votes received.
stats.badgeDescConfidence: Reach a certain trust index percentage to unlock this badge. Next tier: {n}%.
stats.badgeDescMaster: Unlock all other badges to earn this special badge.

settings.title: Settings
settings.showFloatingButtonDescription: Display the floating button on web pages
settings.autoDetectionDescription: Automatically check pages for AI content
settings.anonymousReportingDescription: Submit reports without revealing your identity
settings.shareStatisticsDescription: Help improve the service by sharing usage data
settings.whitelistDomainsDescription: Domains that will not be checked for AI content
settings.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default values?

subscription.faq1Answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll retain access until the end of your billing period.
subscription.faq2Answer: You'll retain access to premium features until the end of your current billing period.

role.proBenefits: API access, priority support, creator tools

footer.upgradeToProDescription: Unlock API access and creator tools

notifications.aiConfirmed: This page contains confirmed AI content
notifications.domainHasReports: This domain has AI content reports
notifications.humanConfirmed: This page is confirmed human content

about.title: Arti AI Detector
about.description: A community-driven extension for detecting AI-generated content on the web. Help build a more transparent internet by contributing to our collective knowledge.

detection.title: AI Detection
detection.description: Advanced algorithms to identify AI-generated text and content across the web

community.title: Community Driven
community.description: Collaborative platform where users vote and verify content authenticity

realtime.title: Real-time Updates
realtime.description: Instant notifications and live status updates as you browse

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your browsing data stays private. We only analyze reported content

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.description: Compete with other contributors and earn badges for accurate reporting

multilingual.title: Multilingual
multilingual.description: Support for multiple languages and international content detection

browse.title: Browse the Web
browse.description: Use the internet normally while the extension runs in the background

detect.title: AI Detection
detect.description: Our algorithms analyze reported pages for potential AI-generated content

vote.title: Community Voting
vote.description: Users vote on content authenticity to build collective intelligence

learn.title: Continuous Learning
learn.description: The system improves accuracy through community feedback and machine learning

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions and troubleshooting tips

contact.title: Contact Support
contact.description: Get in touch with our support team for assistance

community.title: Community Discord
community.description: Join our Discord server to connect with other users

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how we protect your data and respect your privacy

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Read our terms and conditions for using the extension

licenses.title: Open Source Licenses
licenses.description: View the licenses for open source libraries we use
